title: Twisted Treeline, Team Builder and Ranked SR schedule
body:
Hi Everyone,

Wanted to give you all an update on Team Builder. We're seeing good engagement with Team Builder during peak hours however this tapers off in the early morning.

So we're going to be adjusting the Team Builder schedule so that it is enabled from 8am in the morning until 4am the following day.


**Twisted Treeline:**

Thursday: 3:00pm - 1:00am AEDT

Friday: 3:00pm - 1:00am AEDT

Saturday: 3:00pm - 1:00am AEDT

**Team Builder:**

Everyday - 8:00am AEDT - 4:00am (next day) AEDT

**Ranked Summoner's Rift**

Everyday - 8:00am AEDT - 4:00am (next day) AEDT

replies.body: Any news on Normal Drafts? Is there a chance of getting that queue at least periodically enabled?

> Any news on Normal Drafts? Is there a chance of getting that queue at least periodically enabled?

When we're evaluating our queues we look at all modes. I hear you on Normal Draft, I miss it too. 

For queue evaluation it's about making sure what's enabled is a positive and healthy experience and at this point Normal Draft is not something we are looking to enable in the immediate future. We will continue to evaluate it though, like we do with all modes.
are you seriously saying you evaluate team builder i waited an hour in there and couldn't get a game in i never had this problem with draft pick yet you decided to remove that......
oh god this

Since you evaluate all modes, can you take in to consideration on evaluating the limited time gamemode and see if you can put some of those modes on a schedule of their own (e.g Urf or ascension) because it revives some fun instead of just normals and having to wait forever for a new mode. It also can make use of that downloaded content for the modes aswell instead of it going to waste.
Are you even considering ranked 3v3 anymore? That was my favourite in season 2/3
+1 PLEASE Weekend Normal Drafts

What amuses me is that riot is trying to expand the server population before they enable Twisted Treeline for a longer period or permanently. Yet I am one example of a OCE player that continues to play on NA as do half a dozen of my real life friends. This is because 3v3 is not enabled on this server and for the most part is the only game mode we play. I am 1 person and that's 7 people still playing on NA then how many others are still doing the same thing because the server lacks the queue of choice twisted treeline. And before people pipe up and say it is enabled 3 nights a week, we like to play 3's competitively so normal queue simply isn't enough. The point is without a dedicated player base and with a large portion being on another sever, the game mode will never see the light of day.
well said, i also play on us server most of the time, and dont forget all the people who already left because they wont put up with the ping.

The reason my i left my main in NA (apart from my friends) is for ranked TT.
I understand that the queue for 3v3 matches is much longer in comparison to SR, but if some people enjoy playing on that map, they'll put in the time and effort to queue for it regardless of the time :)
Ranked was available for a short time last night on Twisted Treeline, was this intentional?

> Ranked was available for a short time last night on Twisted Treeline, was this intentional?

As MasterMirkinen pointed out in another thread it was not intentional. Sorry about that!

Ranked Teams Twisted Treeline has stricter population requirements than Normal Twisted Treeline and is not something we would look to enable until we have grown to the point of having Normal on all the time.

> > Ranked was available for a short time last night on Twisted Treeline, was this intentional?
> 
> As MasterMirkinen pointed out in another thread it was not intentional. Sorry about that!
> 
> Ranked Teams Twisted Treeline has stricter population requirements than Normal Twisted Treeline and is not something we would look to enable until we have grown to the point of having Normal on all the time.

Have you considered that normal TT may not equal the people who'd play ranked TT? For example, I wouldn't go play a game of it with random people, but 3v3 ranked was quite enjoyable, and I think this might be the case for more people than you'd think.

I'd love to have twisted treeline up and running, and have ranked for it! Side note, OCE must have been up for nearly a year now, are we still waiting for people to transfer to OCE before these queues get opened?
Should just make ranked 3v3 available when normal 3v3 is up :)
I think i had the most fun yesterday when 3v3 Ranked was accidentally brought back for one game :\ ETA on perm 3v3 queues?
What the flippin heck is going on with TT. Why is it still only 3 days a week??
any chance of dominion???

Please, PLEASE leave Team Builder enabled. I played it very often when it was on permanently and at every opportunity when it was Sundays-only, and am loving having it back all the time. Games are always quickly-found, but even if it takes me ten or fifteen minutes to assemble a team it is absolutely worth it to guarantee a great League of Legends experience. I'm confident the levels of queue engagement are, and will remain, high - PLEASE leave it up on either a permanent or more-regular schedule.

> Please, PLEASE leave Team Builder enabled. I played it very often when it was on permanently and at every opportunity when it was Sundays-only, and am loving having it back all the time. Games are always quickly-found, but even if it takes me ten or fifteen minutes to assemble a team it is absolutely worth it to guarantee a great League of Legends experience. I'm confident the levels of queue engagement are, and will remain, high - PLEASE leave it up on either a permanent or more-regular schedule.

Appreciate the feedback! We just updated the schedule. Team Builder is now enabled 8am AEDT till 4am AEDT the next day. We'll be keeping a close eye on it like we do with all of our queues.
You guys are awesome. Thanks so much, this will really aid in my enjoyment of League!

> [{quoted}](name=Lux Praefectus,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=HAK2vcae,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2014-11-20T10:17:22.809+0000)
>
> Please, PLEASE leave Team Builder enabled. I played it very often when it was on permanently and at every opportunity when it was Sundays-only, and am loving having it back all the time. Games are always quickly-found, but even if it takes me ten or fifteen minutes to assemble a team it is absolutely worth it to guarantee a great League of Legends experience. I'm confident the levels of queue engagement are, and will remain, high - PLEASE leave it up on either a permanent or more-regular schedule.

Reread it... It's only disabled for 4 hours in the morning...
umm Riot what ever happended to TwistedTreeline Ranked 3v3?
Why the flip is TT not permanently activated yet??? how long has this server been online now?
Glad that you guys made teambuilder available everyday! Been loving it since it first came out!

I know there have been a few people asking about this over the past 2 years, but I seriously miss it. Why can't we have a Dominion queue? I understand the Oceanic numbers are small, but I can't see why it's such a problem to have it available, if not on a day of the week where numbers spike up.

If I knew that the queue wouldn't be available even after 2 years I probably would've stayed on the NA server just for dominion. I love the mode, and it was fantastic to play when you needed something different and fast paced. ARAM seriously doesn't do that, and there's so many times you can end up in a game of that with a champion you didn't want to play, or one of the teams is so over powered it's just boring. On top of that's it's still the same in terms of objective and gameplay, destroy Turrets > Inhib > Nexus. Dominion offered a mix up from that and a complete difference in strategy. From my experience there are a lot of new players on the Oceanic Server that didn't transfer from NA and have no clue what the Crystal Scar map is even about. I can't even play a custom hoping for a group to verse because everyone seems to think it's for the 'Hide and Seek' game mode and not an actual map. So I think it would be nice to at least do a trial run, like with the 3v3 map.

I understand it's a difficult thing to implement but I hope it's not off the table. Even if it were available a single day each week, even fortnight I'd be happy. I just want to play my favourite mode again. :(

I've still got accounts on NA. But with the server move that is currently in progress there the ping for us will increase to around 300ms.
hardly playable unfortunately. So I think you will be glad that you did make the move if you did it while it was free.

I am still glad I moved to OCE. But if I had stayed, it's a small fee to transfer if the game had become unplayable due to ping. If I were on the NA servers for 2 years playing Dominion and then moved over around now when the ping is going to increase, I would've had 2 years of playing my favourite game mode. Just sad when you're favourite thing about league is taken away.
Any chance of having all the game modes that the NA server has? It's been like 2 years since the server launched.

I do NOT! understand why TT is not available 24-7! i have no idea! there is not enough choice we have ARAM and NORMAL other servers have dominion ARAM TT and everything it is not fair why is OCE the one to fall behind on content?

Yeah its kinda sad, something tells me every single summoner on OCE could ask for riot to open up the TT queue and they would still say no. I wonder if riot has even thought that the server is not expanding at an alarming rate because it is missing so many game modes.

maybe they look at the stats and see that a really low persentage of players play thoes other game modes, or see a massive influx of players when the game mode opens, then no one plays it.

who knows, we blebs dont have thoes figures, but i know riot does.

So 5 months after my last post and still nothing regarding treeline. I see now with the NA server relocation that NA will become uplayable to Aussies all together you have a ping between 200-250 jumping to 230-280 for a lot of people this becomes unplayable. Whats our choice now? Come to OCE where there is no Twisted treeline queue or move on to another game?
wen is TT going to be added to the everyday roster i want to play TT  and why is Sunday not in the roster if you want a 3 day roster remove Thursday and add Sunday

I just looked at the 5.11 patch notes and I see TT changes

SO i am here questioning, why TT hasn't become a full time queue yet, this server came out in 2013, and we still dont have access to all game modes

Hey I know you guys don't wanna enable queues when there aren't numbers, and you've probably heard enough people moaning about ranked 3s...
But maybe just put it on at the same time as normal 3s, or just once a week? I think if you try this out, you'll get enough numbers for it to be worthwhile similar to normal 3s.

:)
Any word on giving Dominion a trial some day? Or are you guys waiting for the hype train on the rumored Dominion rework?

Hope this thread is still getting attention. Was wondering if we could get some information regarding: where the server is right now as far as player base and engagement is concerned? How much it needs to increase to get Twisted Treeline permanently?  How much to get Dominion? It's more just that, at this stage I would like to know if all modes will ever become a reality or if we're going to be in League of Limbo forever. I know it's a lot of questions but clarity around this and knowing how far we've come and how far we have to go would be good. That's how I feel at least.
I highly doubt the reds even read this thread. They know what it's about and will probably just ignore the thread until they feel the time is right.
I've stopped playing league for over a half a year and just came back recently. OCE has been online for like 2 years now? Wheres 3v3 at lol.

how long has the server been available on oce ? why is this crap still in beta, i understand "match making quality" but maybe its time to just release the map and modes, most of the time i cant play 3v3 which is sad since its the the only reason i joined LoL...{{summoner:4}} {{summoner:7}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}}
Any chance of enabling dominion for say one day a week, just like you started twisted treeline with?

Any Chance TT can be opened up for the entire Ocean week challenge?

TT is pretty much the only league i play these days and would be nice if i could contribute to this event more.
Would be great to see Twisted Treeline put in permanently, sure there is enough people playing OCE for that.

I still think Teambuilder needs some major improvements... mainly the matchmaking adjustments. There's over a hundred champions, with six roles to play as. Every player who enters the queue has a 99/100 chance of having this matchmaking adjustment on, and since most people will have it, in the end it just messes up the matchmaker.

I hope teambuilder never replaces blind pick.
I guess both team builder and normal draft are worthwhile than normal blind pick.
Very true. I think (still undecided) that I even prefer TB over draft Normals. If only even more people played it...

Any update to ranked/full time TT, draft or Dominion? 

If not: How the heck do you intend to evaluate growth if you're segregating a fair amount of your user base, forcing them to play on other servers to get the modes they like or not at all. eSports won't bring in the growth you're hoping for, at best it may stymie stagnation, game modes might, at least try it. If it works, involve them in eSports, generate some buzz, I don't think the other regions are doing that.

You maybe worried about splitting a small user base between game modes but what is really happening is that you're splitting them between servers.
Please make Solo Queue Ranked permanently open <3 You did it for a few days and it was the most fun i've had in a long time.
